resources.string: The Young Living blend Purification takes the sting out of fire ant bites. Use every 4-6 hours for 3 days to completely avoid the blistering and pain.
Peppermint is great for relieving headaches. Rub it accross the forehead and on the temples.
Use the Young Living blend R.C. for respiritory problems. Rub topically on chest and diffuse.
In lab testing, the R.C. blend wiped out MRSA!
For babies, use Lemon oil along the spine for a fever
For babies, use Myrtle oil for congestion
Frankincense is working in clinical trials to cure many kinds of cancer!
Lavender is the Swiss Army knife in your essential oil toolkit - anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-fungal!
Concerned about giving your kids toothpase they should not swallow? Try KidScents!
